Hero.main_intro: Empowering Shan language and learning through technology
Hero.sub_intro: ShanHub is built to preserve and promote the Shan language and empower education through the power of technology

Features.title: Our Powerful Features
Features.content: Everything you need to learn, create, and connect with the Shan community

app.FontConverter: Convert Shan fonts to any font
app.TaiLeConverter: Convert Shan script to Tai Le script
app.ShanTranslit: Convert Shan script to Latin script
app.ShanSyllable: Convert Shan script to syllable work break
app.TaiLeSyllable: Convert Tai Le script to syllable work break
app.ShanWordSorting: Sort Shan words by syllable work break
app.ShanProverbs: Learn Shan proverbs and their meanings

Testimonial.title: What Our Community Says
Testimonial.content: Hear from our users about their experiences with ShanHub

Download.title: Download ShanHub App
Download.content: Get the full ShanHub experience on any device. Install our Progressive Web App on your device now.
Download.mobile_content: Perfect for on-the-go access to ShanHub features
Download.chrome_step1: Click the install button or look for the install icon in the address bar
Download.chrome_step3: The app will be added to your device
Download.safari_step1: Tap the share button at the bottom of the screen
Download.safari_step2: Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'
